column4: good day - just did an adept update, rebooted and have no connectivity to my network (system is up and running).. dhclient eth0 shows no discovery, no leases - sleeping
could someone offer some ideas on how to possibly rectify this>
btw pinging my gateway gives Network is unreachable
does eth0 get recognized by your kernel?
is there something else you had in mind?
what I mean by that those processes were ok...was that they return [ok]
I now have 3 entries there:  eth0, lo, and sit0  (dont remember the sit0 before)
is the eth0 address the same as the one for your card in lspci?
yeah, that's just the bus line... you're right, lspci doesn't tell you the mac address.. my memory was bad
what modules have oyu got loaded?
well quite a few Im sure
you oughta find whatever module inserts sit0 and kill it
interesting that network-admin was able to setup that eth0 for static
you have to get it out of the kernel
err first do lsmod and see if you have an ipv6 module loading
well, you have to get that ipv6 out of there somehow
what kernel do you have installed anyway?
